data.title: Sports Facilities
data.meta_description: We offer all range of sports facilities on campus, including Sports Hall, outdoor sports courts, a table tennis room, college function rooms and gyms. They are open to all students and staff for free.
data.text:
We offer all range of sports facilities on campus, including Sports Hall, outdoor sports courts, a table tennis room, college function rooms and gyms. They are open to all students and staff for free.

The Sports Hall includes a multi-function hall (basketball courts, volleyball courts, and badminton courts), a swimming pool, a fitness room, a dance room, a taekwondo room, a bouldering room and a physical fitness assessment center. The outdoor sports fields include basketball courts, volleyball courts, tennis courts, and a soccer field. Some of them can be booked on the "Venue booking system" in advance.

Â

University Sports Hall:

1. Multi-function Hall (including basketball courts, volleyball courts and badminton courts)

2. Swimming Pool

3. Fitness Room

4. Taekwondo Room

5. Dance Room

6. Indoor Bouldering Gym

7. Physical Fitness Assessment Center (temporarily closed)

Opening Hours:

University Sports Hall: 07:00-22:00, Monday to Sunday

Swimming Pool: 15:00-21:30, Tuesday to Sunday (Closed on Monday)

Indoor Bouldering Gym: 14:00-21:30, Wednesday to Sunday (Closed on Monday and Tuesday)

Â

Outdoor Sports Facilities:

1. Outdoor Basketball Courts (5 courts)

2. Outdoor Tennis Courts (5 courts)

3. Outdoor Soccer Field (1 court)

4. Outdoor Volleyball Court (1 court)

5. Outdoor Climbing Court (located next to Block F of Shaw College, for PE courses only)

Opening Hours:

07:00 - 22:00, Monday to Sunday

Â

Other Sports Facilities:

1. Fitness Room of the Amenity Centre, Upper Campus

2. Fitness Room of Shaw College

3. Staff Fitness Room

4. Table Tennis Room

Opening Hours:

07:00-22:00, Monday to Sunday

* The opening hours of the Staff Fitness Room is 6:00-22:00, Monday to Sunday
